translation: Pnnis rb sndi navch tsbyḥ kriv yus sarive khvth thod chuh.
Yymụ̄ (kaynatuk pth kanhh chyz) pạd kor pth diytun tath (tmykụ̄ tmam ẓrvryat mkml krth) drst tvazun.
Th yymụ̄ (p th kunhi chyz khạṭr) mtʿīn prvgram mqrr kvr pth vnun (tath pnnhi pnnhi nẓam mṭạbq rvznk th pknuk) ṭryqh
(ae ʿẓmt valhi ttatthhi!) asụ̄ prnavav tohụ̄panh (tiyuth) zi tohyhi mashav nh (zanhh).
Mgr yhi Allah tʿālyā yczhh,be shk chuh suh jhr th khfy (yʿny nnhi th khttith byyhi baddi th lothi) tmam kthn zanan.
Th asụ̄ krv tohyhi yath āsan (shryʿts pytth ʿml pyra spdnh) khạṭr (thi) shvlyt frahm.
Lhādha rvuziv tohụ̄ nṣyḥt kran bshrṭykh nṣyḥt diyhi (bvzn valyn) fạydh.
Albth sue kri nṣyḥt qbvl yus Allah tʿālyā hs khvczan āshi.
Th bdbkht rvzi aamhi (nṣyḥt) nishhi pth.
Yus (qyamt kh doh) sarive khvth brris nars mnz dạkhl spdi.
Pth nah mri suh tath mnz th nah rvzi zndh.
Be shk spud sue bamurad yus (nfs kyv mṣybtv th gnah kyv mkriyarav nishhi) pak spud.
Byyhi rvud suh pnnis rb sndi navch dhkr kran th (kthrt th pabndy san) rvudnmaz pran.
Blkh chihv tohụ̄ (Allah tʿālyā hs kun rjvʿ krnh bjayhi) dunyạvy zndgy (hndụ̄ mychhr) panh navan.
Ḥalankh ạkhrt (yʿny ākhrtuk mychhr th raḥt) chuh bhtr th hmyshh pth kun rvzn vvl.
Be shk chhe yhi (tʿlym) brvuntthimyn ṣḥyfn mnz (thi drj).
(yim) abrahym th mvsyā (ʿlyhm alslam) sndụ̄ ṣḥyfh chih.
